metadata.title: CVE-2019-0816 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A security feature bypass exists in Azure SSH Keypairs, due to a change inthe provisioning logic for some Linux images that use cloud-init, aka'Azure SSH Keypairs Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability'.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-0816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

cloud-init - 18.5-45-g3554ffe8-0ubuntu1~18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cloud-init package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '18.5-45-g3554ffe8-0ubuntu1~18.04.1').
